techmeme.title: Meta plans to enable group chats between WhatsApp/Messenger and third-party apps in 2025 and voice and video calling with such apps in 2027, to comply with DMA (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Replit launches Replit Agent, an AI agent that can build entire apps from scratch based on prompts, available in beta to Replit Core and Teams subscribers (Chris McKay/Maginative)
Roblox plans to let creators keep 50% to 70% of revenue when their titles are purchased in real currency on desktop computers vs. 30% for purchases with Robux (Alex Heath/The Verge)
Sources: US private equity group TPG is in talks to buy a stake in Europe's largest secondhand fashion site Vinted at a €5B valuation (Financial Times)
Filing: OnlyFans revenue rose 20% YoY to ~$1.31B for the FY ending November 2023; creator accounts grew 29% YoY to ~4.1M while fan accounts rose 28% YoY to 305M (Kaya Yurieff/The Information)
